conclusion: Use total internal reflection (TIR) to solve for angle θ.
Laser beam injected at point O with incident angle α = 45°.
Total internal reflection occurs at the boundary of the optical fiber.
TIR condition: angle of incidence θ_i must be ≥ critical angle θ_c.
Critical angle θ_c is given by sin θ_c = 1/n.
Angle of incidence θ_i inside the fiber is 45°.
For TIR, θ_i = 45° must be ≥ θ_c, so sin 45° = 1/n.
Angle θ is the angle of incidence at TIR boundary, θ = 45°.
